ЁЯФе
Resistance against the Sultanate

Veera Ballala III was the last great ruler of the Hoysala dynasty. During his reign, Malik Kafur plundered Halebidu (Dwarasamudra) in 1311. Nevertheless, Ballala III did not give up and continued to resist even against the Tughlaq dynasty.

ЁЯПЫя╕П
Foundation of Vijayanagara

He played a crucial role in organizing Hindu resistance in South India. Many historians believe that Harihara and Bukka (founders of Vijayanagara) were previously in his service. He attained martyrdom fighting against the Madurai Sultanate in 1343.
